GitHub

Jekyll Boilerplate

Gulp-powered build system with these features:

  • Gulp 4
  • Jekyll 3.8.5
  • Bootstrap 4
  • Fontawesome 5
  • HTML templates with Liquid
  • Sass compilation and prefixing
  • Built-in BrowserSync server
  • For production builds:
    • CSS compression
    • JavaScript compression
    • Image compression
